participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and hardworking, Emily enjoys spending time outdoors and has a deep connection with nature.
participant_1.background: i like to ride horses. i help tend the fields. i like to listen to rock music while working. i have three arabian horses. my father is a farmer.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and ambitious, Jordan is passionate about music and sports and loves socializing with friends.
participant_2.background: my favourite artist is travis scott. my mother is a dentist. i'm currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant. i like playing basketball. i have one older sister.
